Instruction: Describe the target grid.
Generate the referring expression starting with the tag "Expression: " for the given target grid. Omit any other text.

Expression: The target grid has more X-shaped cells than either of the distractor grids, particularly in the upper left and lower right corners where there are three consecutive X-shaped cells. Additionally, it has fewer empty cells compared to the distractor grids. In particular, the target grid has no empty cell in its center, while both distractor grids have an empty cell in their centers.
